phrases: I walk through the white pages of my storybook
with a kaleidoscope of my experiences.
aa yawarakakute atatakai kimi no te
Your hand is so warm held within mine;
nigiri shimete sono kokoro no oku made todoku you ni
it reaches all the way to my heart.
hohoenmi de kureta nara nigirikaeshite kuretara
I cannot see a brighter future
boku wa tada mae wo miteru
than you smiling and taking my hand as well
She is at the festival after party.
Sawako goes out a lot now, does not she?
If she gets a boyfriend, she will be out even more than this!
When Sawako gets married, she will...!
We are not talking about some far off event like marriage.
I wonder if they are on their way yet.
Until they get to the party, it is just the two of them!
That is probably exactly what they said!
I cannot wait to make fun of them.
What if the two of them do not show up??
I meant to take a peek at him in secret but he totally looked at me!!
I am just so nervous, I
Yeah, it is really nerve wracking.
You feel the same way too, right?
No, he only touched her with his hand!
No way, he did not hug her?
I wish I had seen that!
Some people were not lucky enough to see so we were reenacting it for them!
Was what we just saw real?
Do you really like Sadako, Kazehaya?
What did you mean by same here?
When you said it was like a dream, did you mean a good dream?
Wait, did you two just come together?
How did Sadako manage to get with Kazehaya?
Man, you make me so nervous!
They look like they are for real!
I cannot believe you managed to win over Kazehaya!
You were not just faking it.
Please let us get significant others too!
Why did things turn out like this?
It is okay, they both look pretty happy.
Second year, class D, congratulations on sixth place in the school festival!
And with girls from another class!
Is not our class having their party right now?
I was going to go, but these girls invited me out first.
Are not you lonely, drinking all the way out here by yourself?
Now he is a confessed and successful Kazehaya!
Were they really such good friends?
Do not make Sadako cry anymore, now.
Did you hear why Sadako was crying outside that day?
Because she thought you liked someone!
I knew that was your fault!
And it is Sawako, not Sadako!
Are you sure it is okay for me to call her Sawako?
I am just using Sadako as a cute nickname for her.
Did you manage to tell him?
You sure you are not the only one who thinks that?
Did you actually ask her Kuronuma, go out with me?
Does she really look like someone who would just somehow understand things?
is not the right way to do it.
Who do you think helped you two get this far?
Please let me think about it!
Are you sure it is okay to not go after her and explain?
What do you think you are doing?!
Whose fault is it that things are like this?
Worst case scenario, she might say yes.
She thinks you are serious, and when you tell her you are not,
Now it is not a question of asking her out anymore.
I will try not to stay out too late.
If I were to get married, how would you feel?
Kazehaya, are you saying that was a misunderstanding?
Even I did not really take that seriously.
I knew it was Mr. Arai who said that.
I need to find a hole and hide...
I did not mean to make you misunderstand things.
The idea was so beautiful that I could not help myself.
I am sorry for being so selfish.
I should not have asked if you understood.
This is too important not to say straight out.
We will never move forward otherwise.
I will always take care of you.
I also have something important to say to you.
No matter what you say, I will never hate you.
I cannot look at you without hidden desires anymore.
There is no way I could hate you for that!
I guess we had nothing to worry about.
We can see what you want.
Nah, I just think they look really good together.
I feel bad for saying that he is the most distant from her.
Who would you say that to?
Just before they started being really awkward with each other.
Everything turned out okay in the end!
Go back to the girls from the other class!
Class C extended their party too?
This diary is not a dream.
It looked very good on him.
He was wearing regular clothes at the party.
It seems like it was not a dream!
Sleeping made it seem like it was nothing but a dream.
But all of these reminders I left for myself before bed...
Kazehaya's eyes supposedly turned red while he was confessing to her!
What are you lining up for?
Supposedly everyone who got advice at the Black Magic Cafe were able to confess and are now dating!
F-Feels like I am swindling them!
Seriously, if she had that sort of skill the two of us would already have amazing boyfriends.
There are only idiots, losers, and baldies here though!
But I am glad she does not have to worry about being bullied.
Please let me borrow a good luck charm!
Like one of your spirit summons!
Do not tell me Kazehaya believes I have magic too!
I do not even want to get involved.
I said it was not like that!
He is blushing so it is got to be true!
Kazehaya says he is always liked you!
Yeah, he said it was like a dream come true!
Since we have such a large audience, even from other classes,
why do not you make it crystal clear for everyone?
He used such a real, direct word.
My dreams really did come true, but it is really overwhelming.
Just leave me alone for a while.
To sum it up, please look this way.
Now everyone, please be sure to spread the good news!
Did not I say to leave me alone?!
Yeah, they were like that at the party too...
Looking at them now, I cannot believe I did not see how perfect
they were for each other until now.
This is how it should be.
No one thought Kurumi would be the heartbroken one,
douka i am about to dake wa furimukanaide
Please do not look at me right now
The sun's set, the wind's blowing,
and we are so close that we can almost touch
My gaze has always been fixed on you
I do not mind if this emotion is what they call love,
and I do not care if I get hurt by it
I just want to tell you, over and over again
My story has only just begun.
